txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Scarred ears from the beasts surrounding Oatbarton. You can make the delivery to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton centre.
'I am certain that I can find someone who can work with this. Thank you.'
'We can likely find a use for every bit of the beasts that you find and hunt. If you find anything that might be interesting, bring it to me.'
The townsfolk in Oatbarton await the delivery of scarred ears to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town.
Deliver the scarred ears to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton
You have been tasked with collecting and delivering scarred ears from the beasts surrounding Oatbarton. You are to deliver the items to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town of Oatbarton.
Wanted: Scarred ears from the beasts surrounding Oatbarton.
